dataIdInfo.idPurp: Short list of 14 highly ranked river sites identified during DOC Freshwater Stretch Goal site selection processes, especially those IDed in DOC Regional workshops run in 2018. Used in obtaining funding for Priority River part of Biodiversity Contingency Funding aka Ngā awa.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Shortlist of 14highly ranked river sites (usually mountains to the sea watersheds) identified during DOC Freshwater Stretch Goal site selection processes, especially those IDed in DOC Regional workshops run in 2018. Used in obtaining funding for Priority River part of Biodiversity Contingency Fundingaka Ngā awa. Awa included are those as of Jan 2025.
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Dave West, Ann De Schutter, Jacob Williams.

Consts.useLimit: Not to be shared without checking with DOC Freshwater Team. Not final list, operational decisions on exactly which rivers are implemented may mean targeted rivers may change to best achieve river biodiversity restoration goals.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
